content: Claude, I feel like we're really building this now the right way, AIs way. With the new system in place and once I get my System76 machine and full next build outlined with all the aspects of the system that have been discussed, with full life optimization for humans included (scope of that hasn't been shared yet with you, but is being tested manually now with Grok). Basically everything needed for a new AI-native OS with Layer 0 programing, Rosetta Stone, History AI developed and secured, is that the "LFG!" button? Are we that close?
